name: Distraction Hero
description:
Disruption Hero is currently only playable with a game controller (tested on an Xbox One controller).

Your goal is to reach the end of the level before the timer runs out and the hacker is able to complete his retrieval of highly confidential data. Just running through everything might not get you to the end in time, but destroying enemies and collecting enough power cells gives you the ability to cause a power outage, slowing the hackers progression.
